summary: Initial testing of Digital Measure app revealed critical AI integration failure. Frontend loads correctly but core blueprint analysis feature is completely broken due to emergentintegrations library compatibility issue with OpenAI GPT-4o.

critical_bugs.issue: AI vision analysis fails with 'File attachments are only supported with Gemini provider' error when using OpenAI GPT-4o
critical_bugs.impact: Core functionality completely broken - users cannot analyze blueprints
critical_bugs.technical_details: emergentintegrations library doesn't support file attachments with OpenAI models, only with Gemini provider

working_endpoints.status: ✅ Working - POST and GET both functional
✅ Working - returns empty list (no successful analyses yet)

integration_issues.issue: Will fail when users try to analyze files due to backend AI integration failure

passed_tests: Backend basic API endpoints (root, status, analyses)
File upload validation (error handling for invalid file types)
UI components presence and accessibility (data-testid attributes)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix AI integration in backend. The emergentintegrations library doesn't support file attachments with OpenAI GPT-4o. Need to either: 1) Switch to Gemini provider, 2) Use different approach for sending images to OpenAI (base64 in message), or 3) Use alternative vision API library. Core blueprint analysis feature is completely non-functional.
